trans-unit.source: Retrieves or sets the value of one of the system-wide parameters

trans-unit.source: [optional] If a system parameter is being set, specifies whether the user profile is to be updated, and

seg-source.mrk: If a system parameter is being set, specifies whether the user profile is to be updated, and

target.mrk: If a system parameter is being set, specifies whether the user profile is to be updated, and

trans-unit.source: if so, whether the $WM_SETTINGCHANGE message is to be broadcast. This parameter can be zero if you don't want

seg-source.mrk: if so, whether the $WM_SETTINGCHANGE message is to be broadcast.
This parameter can be zero if you don't want

target.mrk: if so, whether the $WM_SETTINGCHANGE message is to be broadcast.
This parameter can be zero if you don't want

trans-unit.source: to update the user profile or it can be one or more of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: to update the user profile or it can be one or more of the following values:

target.mrk: to update the user profile or it can be one or more of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $SPIF_UPDATEINIFILE - Writes the new setting to the user profile

seg-source.mrk: $SPIF_UPDATEINIFILE - Writes the new setting to the user profile

trans-unit.source: $SPIF_SENDCHANGE - Broadcasts the $WM_SETTINGCHANGE message after updating the user profile

trans-unit.source: Get the working visible area of the desktop, this doesn't include the area covered by the taskbar.
